__memcpy: void memcpy(float* dst, float* src, int size, char direction) {for(int i_mem=0; i_mem<size/4; i_mem++) {dst[i_mem]=src[i_mem];}}
__bang_add: void bang_add(float* C, float* A, float* B, int size) {for(int i_add=0; i_add < size; i_add++){C[i_add]=A[i_add] + B[i_add];}}
__bang_active_tanh: void bang_active_tanh(float* C, float* A, int size) {for(int i_tah = 0; i_tah < size; i_tah++) {C[i_tah] = tanh(A[i_tah]);}}
__bang_active_sign: void bang_active_sign(float* C, float* A, int size) {for(int i_sgn = 0; i_sgn < size; i_sgn++) {C[i_sgn] = sign(A[i_sgn]);}}
__bang_write_zero: void bang_write_zero(float* C, int size) {for(int i_zro = 0; i_zro < size; i_zro++) {C[i_zro] = 0.0f;}}
__bang_sumpool: void bang_sumpool(float *dst, float *src, int channel, int height, int width, int kernel_height, int kernel_width) {for (int sum_c = 0; sum_c < channel; sum_c++) {for (int sum_i = 0; sum_i < height / kernel_height; sum_i++) {for (int sum_j = 0; sum_j < width / kernel_width; sum_j++) {float sum = 0;for (int kh = 0; kh < kernel_height; kh++) {for (int kw = 0; kw < kernel_width; kw++) {int h = sum_i * kernel_height + kh;int w = sum_j * kernel_width + kw;sum += src[sum_c * height * width + h * width + w];}}dst[sum_c * height / kernel_height * width / kernel_width + sum_i * width / kernel_width + sum_j] = sum;}}}}
__memset_nram: void memset_nram(float *dst, int size, float value){for(int i_set = 0; i_set < size; i_set++) {dst[i_set] = value;}}
__bang_div: void bang_div(float* dest, float* src1, float* dinominator, float* addition, int size){for(int i_div = 0; i_div < size; i_div++){dest[i_div] = src1[i_div] / dinominator[i_div];}}
__bang_active_exp: void bang_active_exp(float* dst, float* src, int size){for(int i_exp = 0; i_exp < size; i_exp++){dst[i_exp] = expf(src[i_exp]);}}
__bang_matmul: void bang_matmul(float* C, float* A, float B, int M, int P, int N) {for (int mul_i = 0; mul_i < M; mul_i++) {for (int mul_j = 0; mul_j < N; mul_j++) {float sum = 0.0;for (int mul_k = 0; mul_k < P; mul_k++) {sum += A[mul_i * P + mul_k] * B[mul_k * N + mul_j];}C_nram[mul_i * N + mul_j] = sum;}}}
__bang_minpool: void bang_minpool(float *dst, float *src, int channel, int height, int width, int kernel_height, int kernel_width) {int output_height = height - kernel_height + 1;int output_width = width - kernel_width + 1;for (int c_mp = 0; c_mp < channel; ++c_mp) {for (int oh = 0; oh < output_height; ++oh) {for (int ow = 0; ow < output_width; ++ow) {float min_val = src[c_mp * height * width + (oh) * width + ow];for (int kh = 0; kh < kernel_height; ++kh) {for (int kw = 0; kw < kernel_width; ++kw) {int ih = oh + kh;int iw = ow + kw;float val = src[c_mp * height * width + ih * width + iw];if (val < min_val) {min_val = val;}}}dst[c_mp * output_height * output_width + oh * output_width + ow] = min_val;}}}}
__bang_maxpool: void bang_maxpool(float *dst, float *src, int channel, int height, int width, int kernel_height, int kernel_width) {int output_height = height - kernel_height + 1;int output_width = width - kernel_width + 1;for (int c_maxp = 0; c_maxp < channel; ++c_maxp) {for (int oh = 0; oh < output_height; ++oh) {for (int ow = 0; ow < output_width; ++ow) {float max_val = src[c_maxp * height * width + oh * width + ow];for (int kh = 0; kh < kernel_height; ++kh) {for (int kw = 0; kw < kernel_width; ++kw) {int ih = oh + kh;int iw = ow + kw;float val = src[c_maxp * height * width + ih * width + iw];if (val > max_val) {max_val = val;}}}dst[c_maxp * output_height * output_width + oh * output_width + ow] = max_val;}}}}
__bang_avgpool: void bang_avgpool(float *dst, float *src, int channel, int height, int width, int kernel_height, int kernel_width) {int output_height = height - kernel_height + 1;int output_width = width - kernel_width + 1;int kernel_size = kernel_height * kernel_width;for (int c = 0; c < channel; ++c) {for (int oh = 0; oh < output_height; ++oh) {for (int ow = 0; ow < output_width; ++ow) {float sum = 0.0f;for (int kh = 0; kh < kernel_height; ++kh) {for (int kw = 0; kw < kernel_width; ++kw) {int ih = oh + kh;int iw = ow + kw;sum += src[c * height * width + ih * width + iw];}}dst[c * output_height * output_width + oh * output_width + ow] = sum / kernel_size;}}}}}
